name: Bossy Cat
description:
What is bossy cat?
It is a bitsy game developed by a video game design student. Here you can reflect on why we do everything they ask of us in video games without thinking for a minute, maybe it's because there is no other option...
Why should I play Bossy Cat?
You should try this short experience that will not take 5 minutes to finish but it will give you a different point of view. 
Will there be updates or part two?

There will be no updates, but if there is a lot of support in this game, I could release another similar game.
